divs: Sighting DetailsWell the last time I called you and I saw this in Heber I watched it for about 2 to 3 hours with my father for some of the time. Later that night I was sleeping in muy fathers motor home and I felt something and woke up. All the sudden I couldn't move I couldn't yell or speak. I felt him or it on my back and I freeked out and faught it off me but as I was doing so I started spinning around in the bed physically. After I got him off me. I Laid awake a little concerned about what just happened. aany way it is out there right now in the southern sky. Once again I say if you still would like to go to heber sometime and probably check one out feel free. John (P.S. I think I am soposed to go with them tonight from what they said, I was just thinking I should probably have shapporone. You know some of the things that they do are kinda adult if ya know what I meen.)
Summary: A light in the sky moving right now.
